mapper.select: SELECT b.mes_book_code1, b.mes_book_code2, b.mes_book_code3, u.like_id, u.user_seq, u.user_name, b.bom_name, bk.book_name, bk.book_img, li.li_book_info, bu.buser_seq, bu.buser_date, bu.buser_end, bk.book_pub, bk.book_author FROM bom b LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON b.bom_code = (u.like_id + 1000) LEFT JOIN mes_book m ON (m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code1 OR m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code2 OR m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code3) LEFT JOIN book bk ON m.book_isbn = bk.book_isbn LEFT JOIN li_book li ON bk.book_isbn = li.book_isbn LEFT JOIN bookflix_user bu ON u.user_seq = bu.user_seq WHERE u.user_seq = #{seq} GROUP BY b.mes_book_code1, b.mes_book_code2, b.mes_book_code3, u.like_id, u.user_seq, u.user_name, b.bom_name, bk.book_name, bk.book_img, li.li_book_info, bk.book_pub, bk.book_author, bu.buser_date, bu.buser_end, bu.buser_seq

SELECT rownum, a.* FROM ( SELECT bu.user_seq, rpad(substr(user_id, 1, 2), length(user_id), '*') as user_id, review_contents, review_date, review_score FROM bf_review br LEFT OUTER JOIN bookflix_user bu ON br.buser_seq = bu.buser_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON bu.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE review_score = 5 ORDER BY review_seq ) a WHERE rownum <= 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bf_review (review_seq, buser_seq, review_name, review_contents, review_date, review_score) VALUES ( review_seq.nextval, #{buser_seq}, (SELECT bom_name FROM bom b LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON b.bom_code = (u.like_id + 1000) WHERE u.user_seq = #{user_seq}) || ' 후기', #{review_contents}, SYSDATE, #{review_score} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET user_sub = 'Y' WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookflix_user (buser_seq, user_seq, buser_date, buser_end) VALUES (buser_seq.nextval, #{userSeq}, sysdate, add_months(sysdate, 1))
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET user_sub = 'N' WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq}
